LanguageData.Milira_FallenAngel_Action_A: Bring Milira back to the colony
LanguageData.label: Milira Communicator
LanguageData.description: Attempt to connect with the Sky City.
LanguageData.CommunicatorDisconnected: The communicator cannot connect to any channel
LanguageData.R_OptA: We found an injured Milira — she taught us how to make this.
LanguageData.R_OptA_S_text: What did you do to her?!
LanguageData.R_OptA_S_OptA: She’s lying in our infirmary. You can speak to her directly.
LanguageData.R_OptA_S_OptB: If you want her to stay alive, send some supplies. Otherwise…
LanguageData.R_OptA_S_OptA_S_text: Do you need us to pick you up?
LanguageData.R_OptA_S_OptA_S_OptA: I shouldn’t go back. They’re very kind—different from the rumors about ground‑dwellers. I’ll stay with them for now.
LanguageData.R_OptA_S_OptB_S_text: I knew it—you ground‑dwellers are greedy beasts! Return our person first and you’ll be rewarded.
LanguageData.R_OptA_S_OptA_S_OptA_S_text: Do you need us to pick you up?
LanguageData.R_OptA_S_OptA_S_OptA_S_OptA: I shouldn’t go back. They’re very kind—different from the rumors about ground‑dwellers. I’ll stay with them for now.
LanguageData.Milira_FallenAngel_Action_Desc: A dying Milira lies on the ground, badly wounded. Her faint breathing is striking in the silence. What should we do?
LanguageData.Milira_FallenAngel_Action_A_Desc: You pulled me back from Death’s hands; I owe you one. Could you do me another favor? Use the communicator to contact Kalido.
LanguageData.Milira_FallenAngel_Accept_Desc:
She is a Fallen Angel from the Sky City. She is badly injured and needs your help.
You can choose to let her stay and live with you, or send her back.
LanguageData.BFA_FA_Accept_ShuttleArrived_Text: The shuttle for transporting the Fallen Angel has arrived. Load the designated subject aboard.
LanguageData.BFA_FA_Accept_Destroyed_Text: The shuttle for transporting the Fallen Angel has been destroyed. The quest has failed.
LanguageData.Milira_FallenAngel_Leave_Desc: Because you didn’t reach Kalido, [PAWN] decides to leave on her own. She will say goodbye before departing.
